title: Fork, ca. 1690
creditline: The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg
description: Two long tines, chiseled at the joint. Baluster-shaped neck, small flaring handle with rounded top. Brass mounts and band along the sides engraved with decorative pattern. Three brass rivets on each side of the handle. Front and back of handle carved mother-of-pearl.

tombstone.epitaph:
Fork, ca. 1690.
ca. 1690. steel, brass, mother-of-pearl. The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg. 1985-103-96.
